text: Folks! is a 1992 American black comedy movie directed by Ted Kotcheff and stars Tom Selleck, Don Ameche, Anne Jackson, Christine Ebersole, Wendy Crewson, Jon Favreau. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * Category:1992 comedy movies Category:1990s black comedy movies Category:American black comedy movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Ted Kotcheff Category:Movies set in Florida
title: Folks!
